duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote real estate rental services.
Lead a team of business development specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set sales and growth goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's market share in accordance with the company’s objectives for growth, customer satisfaction, and retention.
Plan and oversee the development and implementation of the annual strategic plan for networking and client acquisition.
Conduct client discovery calls and package pricing and proposals in accordance with company policies and strategies.
Collaborate with the Client Relations & Support department through the completion of the account onboarding process.
Attend and participate in client meetings and networking events as determined by the plan.
Manage clients throughout the sales process until the service agreement is finalized and all onboarding checklists are completed.
Develop and implement strategic action plans for each department goal.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
